item.description:
The name of the movie is "Gone Baby Gone"

Starring: Casey Affleck, Michelle Monaghan, Morgan Freeman, Ed Harris

Official Website:

http://www.gonebabygo...

Plot Summary: "Gone Baby Gone," Academy Award®-winner Ben Affleck's directorial debut, stars Casey Affleck ("Ocean's Eleven"), Michelle Monaghan ("Mission: Impossible III"), Academy Award®-winner Morgan Freeman and Academy Award®-nominee Ed Harris. Based on the novel by Dennis Lehane ("Mystic River") and adapted for the screen by Affleck and Aaron Stockard, the film tells the story of two private investigators hunting for an abducted 4-year-old girl in the seamiest side of Boston's underworld.

The film begins@7:30PM downstairs in auditorium 2. Please buy your tickets AHEAD of time! Doreen will be near the concession stand at 7, please be on time....it is going to be crazy! If you are new to the group, Doreen will be wearing a badge. JediFonger (aka YiFeng) will be hearing a green hat with the meetup logo+his screename JediFonger on the front. The hat is ugly and easy to spot =).
item.name: Gone Baby Gone
